sentences.en: Can you present any references who might vouch for your character?
sentences.cn: 你能提供一些可以为你的人格作担保的证明人吗？

sentences.en: Don't ask new contacts to vouch for you; that's not fair.
sentences.cn: 不要拜托新认识的人为你担保, 那是不合理的.

sentences.en: Experts vouch for the painting's authenticity.
sentences.cn: 由专家确认该画是否为真迹.

sentences.en: I can vouch for him / his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我可以为他[他的诚实]作担保.

sentences.en: I can vouch for his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我可以为他的诚实做担保。

sentences.en: I can vouch for the fact that he is a good worker.
I can't vouch for it that he is in town.
sentences.cn: 我不能说他一定在城里.

sentences.en: I can't vouch for the accuracy of my memory.
sentences.cn: 我无法保证我的记忆正确无误.

sentences.en: I can't vouch for this hotel ( = I have no personal experience of it ) but it looked wonderful from the brochure.
sentences.cn: 我没住过这家旅馆,可从指南上看它很棒.

sentences.en: I said, yeah, I'm vouch for him because I believe in him.
sentences.cn: 我说:“是的, 我替他担保,因为我相信他. ”

sentences.en: I've read this report carefully and I can vouch for its correctness.
sentences.cn: 我仔细看过这份报告,认为它正确无误.

sentences.en: I've read this report carefully and I can vouch for its truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我已仔细看过这份报告,我可以保证它的真实性.

sentences.en: Kim's mother agreed to vouch for Maria and get her a job.
sentences.cn: 金的母亲同意为玛丽亚担保，好让她找份工作。

sentences.en: They asked whether I was prepared to vouch for him.
sentences.cn: 他们问我是否愿意为他作担保.

sentences.en: We are ready to vouch for the truth of the report.
sentences.cn: 我们愿意保证这一报导的真实性.

sentences.en: You should give the names of two people who can vouch for your honesty and reliability.
sentences.cn: 你应该提供两个能担保你诚实可信的人的名字.

sentences.en: You think they'll vouch for you after I find out the truth about this ring?
sentences.cn: 我查出这只钻戒的真相他们还会替你说话 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 收据；证人；保证人；证明者

trans.tran_cn: 保证，担保，确定，确定地说
（因亲眼看见而）为…作证，断定，<律>传（某人）出庭作证
